farabio
+++++++++++++++++

farabio is a minimal PyTorch toolkit for out-of-the-box 
deep learning support in biomedical imaging. 
out-of-the-box deep learning support in biomedical imaging.

Features:

* Biomedical datasets

* Common DL models

* Flexible trainers (in progress)

----------------

   reference/index.rst
   handbook/index.rst
